section.section: In Cecil, Dorchester, Frederick, Talbot, and Wicomico counties, the owner or custodian of a female dog that is in heat may not knowingly allow the dog to run at large.
In Cecil, Dorchester, Frederick, and Wicomico counties, the owner or custodian of a female dog that is in heat shall confine the dog.

text.section: A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $25.
